Verify the dropdown has width 200px, height 30px, 1px solid #ced4da border, its top edge aligns with the input field below it (y coordinate difference less than 2px), border radius 3px, and is visible

Verify the 'Download Report' button is enabled, has text 'Download Report (PDF)', background color #28a745, text color #ffffff, font size 16px, border radius 5px, padding 10px 20px, 'aria-label' 'Download detailed sales report in PDF format', left position 20px, top 50px, and width 200px
Verify clicking the 'Download Report' button triggers a file download without navigating away
Verify the banner text 'Limited Time Offer: Save 20%!' has font family 'Montserrat, sans-serif', font size 24px, font weight 700, color #dc3545, and is horizontally centered
Verify the banner's background color is #fff3cd, with padding 15px and border 1px solid #ffeeba
Verify the banner animates fading in over 500ms on page load, reaching opacity 1.0
Verify the banner's top position is 0px and it spans the full viewport width
Verify the shopping cart icon displays a count of '3' items with font size 12px and text color #ffffff, inside a red circle (background #dc3545, border radius 50%, width 20px, height 20px)
Verify the shopping cart icon itself is visible, enabled, and positioned at x 900, y 20 in the header
After submitting a form

Verify the success message 'Your order has been placed successfully!' appears with text color #155724, background color #d4edda, border 1px solid #c3e6cb, padding 15px, border radius 4px, is visible for 5 seconds, has top-center alignment, width 500px, and font size 18px
Verify the success message fades out (transition opacity to 0 over 800ms) after 5 seconds

Verify the date picker input field has placeholder 'Select a date', its current value is empty, is enabled, has a 1px solid #cccccc border, width 180px, height 38px, label text 'Booking Date', placeholder font size 14px, and placeholder color #6c757d
Verify on focus, the date picker input field's border color changes to #007bff with a transition over 100ms

Verify the 'Next Page' button is visible, enabled, has text 'Next', font size 14px, color #007bff, transparent background color, is positioned on the right side of the pagination control, and has margin-left 5px
Verify on hover, the 'Next Page' button shows a 1px solid #007bff border and its text color remains #007bff

Verify the 'User Agreement' link has URL 'https://example.com/agreement.html', text 'User Agreement', font size 13px, color #007bff, 'aria-label' 'Read our User Agreement', margin-top 10px, is left-aligned with x position 15px, font weight 400, and opacity 1.0
Verify when the 'User Agreement' link is clicked, it opens in a new tab
Verify on hover, the 'User Agreement' link has a border-bottom of 1px solid #007bff
Verify the product rating display shows 4.5 stars (value), with 5 star icons in total (count), is left-aligned, positioned at x 10, y 100, has margin-bottom 5px, and label text 'Product Rating'
Verify each star icon has width 16px and height 16px
Verify the filled stars have color #ffc107
Verify the empty stars have color #e0e0e0
On a mobile viewport (width 360px)
Verify the hamburger menu icon is visible, has width 30px, height 24px, color #333333, and is positioned at top 10px, right 10px
Verify the 'Desktop Menu' item is hidden
Click the hamburger menu icon
Verify the overlay menu appears with background color rgba(0,0,0,0.8), slides in from the left (animation duration 300ms), covers 75% of the viewport width, and has 'aria-label' 'Main Navigation'
After scrolling down 500px

Verify the 'Back to Top' button appears with opacity 1.0, background color #000000, color #ffffff, border radius 50% (circular shape), fixed position at bottom 20px, right 20px, font size 18px, 'aria-label' 'Scroll to top of page', width 40px, and height 40px
Verify the 'Product Details' tab is currently 'active' with bottom border 2px solid #007bff, text color #007bff, font weight 700, label 'Product Details', and background color #f8f9fa
Verify the 'Reviews' tab is inactive with text color #6c757d and font weight 400
Verify each tab has padding 10px 15px, font size 16px, and total width 150px
